SELECT SUPR_ID , BIZR_NUM , RPRS_NAME , SUPR_NAME , TEL_NUM , FAX_NUM , RPR_MAIL , POST_NUM , BASC_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , DLVY_AMT , DLVA_FCON , PS_COM , APR_PROD , APD_PROD , SBK_PROD , SVMN_USCON , DLVREF_CONT , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM
FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SPINFOXM
ORDER BY REG_DTM ASC

SELECT SUPR_ID , BIZR_NUM , RPRS_NAME , SUPR_NAME , TEL_NUM , FAX_NUM , RPR_MAIL , POST_NUM , BASC_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , DLVY_AMT , DLVA_FCON , PS_COM , APR_PROD , APD_PROD , SBK_PROD , SVMN_USCON , DLVREF_CONT , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SPINFOXM WHERE SCSS_YN = 'N' AND ROWID IN (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SPINFOXM GROUP BY SUPR_NAME) ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC

SELECT SUPR_ID , BIZR_NUM , RPRS_NAME , SUPR_NAME , TEL_NUM , FAX_NUM , RPR_MAIL , POST_NUM , BASC_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , DLVY_AMT , DLVA_FCON , PS_COM , APR_PROD , APD_PROD , SBK_PROD , SVMN_USCON , DLVREF_CONT , BIZR_STYLE , BIZR_EVENT , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM
FROM POLARBEAR.TB_SPINFOXM WHERE SUPR_ID = #{SUPR_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE POLARBEAR.TB_SPINFOXM SET SCSS_YN = 'Y' , MODP_ID = #{REGP_ID} , MOD_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE SUPR_ID = #{SUPR_ID}
